title: The Latest: Texas schools amend dress code to require masks
snippet: A Texas school district is amending its dress code to require masks in hopes of sidestepping Gov. Greg Abbott's executive order banning mask mandates. The Paris Independent School District's board of trustees voted to require masks as part of its dress code when classes begin Thursday.
